Uses of Class
edu.mines.jtk.sgl.Node

Packages that use Node
edu.mines.jtk.sgl A scene graph for interactive 3-D graphics via OpenGL. 
 

Uses of Node in edu.mines.jtk.sgl
 

Subclasses of Node in edu.mines.jtk.sgl
 class AxisAlignedFrame
          An axis-aligned frame is a group of axis-aligned panels.
 class AxisAlignedPanel
          An axis-aligned panel is a special child of an axis-aligned frame.
 class AxisAlignedQuad
          An axis-aligned quad has one frame that contains one or more panels.
 class Group
          A node in the scene graph that may contain node children.
 class Handle
          A handle for manipulating other nodes.
 class HandleBox
          An axis-aligned handle box.
 class ImagePanel
          An axis-aligned panel that draws a 2D image of a slice of a 3D array.
 class ImagePanelGroup
          A group of image panels that display a single 3D array.
 class ImagePanelGroup2
          A group of image panels that displays two 3D arrays of floats.
 class LineGroup
          A group of connected line segments.
 class PointGroup
          A group of unstructured points.
 class QuadGroup
          A group of quads that represents a surface.
 class TensorsPanel
          An axis-aligned panel that displays a slice of a 3D metric tensor field.
 class TransformGroup
          A group node that transforms the coordinates for its children.
 class TriangleGroup
          A group of triangles that represents a triangulated surface.
 class World
          A world is a root node in the scene graph.
